name.value: Discharge Method NHS Data Model and Dictionary

description.value: A code representing the method used to discharge a patient from care, typically an acute inpatient episode, using the values listed in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary definition for Discharge Method.

display.value: Patient discharged on clinical advice or with clinical consent
Patient discharged him/herself or was discharged by a relative or advocate
Patient discharged by mental health review tribunal, Home Secretary or court
